info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 2:46PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM MDT... At 246 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Dalton Lake, or 9 miles south of Sturgis, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Tilford, Dalton Lake, and Fort Meade. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 33 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
